[vc_row][vc_column]

5 gallon preform mould (Thick wall preform mould)

[vc_column_text]5 gallon preform moulds also named thick wall preform mould are mainly designed for the water dispenser and water cooler. Nowadays the PET 5 gallon bottles are getting more popular comparing the PC bottles due the lower investment, rich in the color, free of BFA.At WASHUN, we provide the hot runner system which special designed for the thick wall preforms, that guarantees the less welding line of the preforms during the injection process. The thread plates are slide by the cam roller system, helps the operator save the time on the maintenance. If adding the robot post cooling system with our thick wall preform molding system, the cycle time can be reduced significantly.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
The 5 Gallon Preform Moulds Produced by WASHUN
